description: This file defines an API client class 'ApiClient' that wraps backend API endpoints for user authentication and attendance tracking. It manages configuration via environment variables, performs HTTP requests, and processes JSON responses for various entities like User, Class, Student, Attendance, etc.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with backend endpoints for authentication, fetching classes and students, marking attendance, and retrieving attendance data.

methods.name: baseUrl
methods.description: Getter that returns the configured base URL for API requests, defaults to localhost if not set.

methods.name: _baseUrl
methods.description: Private getter that retrieves URL from environment variable or defaults to localhost.

methods.name: _headers
methods.description: Generates HTTP headers, including optional authorization token.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, returning a UserModel object.

methods.name: getClasses
methods.description: Fetches list of classes for the current user.

methods.name: getStudents
methods.description: Fetches list of students in a specific class.

methods.name: markAttendance
methods.description: Marks attendance for a class session.

methods.name: getToday
methods.description: Retrieves today's attendance data for a class.

methods.name: getWeekly
methods.description: Retrieves weekly attendance summary for a class.
